title: Are we ever gonna get the champion themes on other sources other than youtube like Spotify?
body: With the news of them not doing login screens anymore and its been obvious that they've stopped I just wanna know if theres any confirmation or whatever about them putting the themes on Spotify? I know they're on soundcloud but I just would like it on Spotify so that I atleast have somewhere to listen to all of the themes I like.
